name: REM (Pyroleaf)
description:
A horror game where speed and attentiveness is key.

The only way to escape is to find the fuse box and its missing fuses to power the elevator. Something is out there... don't let it see you...

  • Move: W, S, A, D
  • Crouch: Left Shift, Left Ctrl, C
  • Toggle Flashlight: F
  • Interact: E
